item.title: Docs: Deployment
item.description: The recommended way to deploy HortaCloud is to use the AWS CDK to automatically provision AWS resources. You can also deploy the services locally on your own client/server machines.

item.title: Docs: Operation
item.description: We are in the process of building out this documentation.
